Method Detail

getMessages

public static boolean getMessages(java.lang.String newLang,
                                  boolean bRefresh)
Load up the messages in the newLang language. Does not load messages if the language has not changed, and bRefresh is false

Parameters:
newLang - The i18n country code fr, en, fr_FR
bRefresh - If true we will load the the messages.
Returns:
true if language has not changed or we loaded the messages. false means we load 'en' messages, or failed
